Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help

Package com.cmt3319.game

Class Summary
Arrow Places a selectable arrow on screen.
Assets Singleton used to store all assets used in game, including images and audio.
Cloud Draws a cloud on screen and provides necessary methods to move across the screen, and to check if it is still on screen.
CloudManager Manages a list of Cloud.
GamePlayScreen Runs and updates game play screen.
HelpScreenOne First help screen, provides information on controls.
HelpScreenTwo Seconds help screen, provides information on items.
HighscoreScreen Presents users high score loaded from Settings.getHighScore().
LoadingScreen First screen loaded when game is run, loads all assets associated with project.
MainMenuScreen First visible screen, provides users with a number of options including: play game (loads GamePlayScreen, High scores (loads HighscoreScreen), and help (loads HelpScreenOne).
Map Creates and draws world based on TileSet and Tile and is responsible for dealing with collisions with tilemaps and Player.
MovingObject Represents the player and enemies in the game.
PlatformGame Entry point into the game.
Player Extends MovingObject and introduces animation.
Score Draws score on screen during game play.
Settings Holds a number of settings for the game including: if sound is enabled, high score, and if gravity is reversed.
Tile Represents a tile on screen.
TileSet Holds the tilesets used by Map.
 

Enum Summary
GamePlayScreen.GameState  
Tile.TileID
